column2: hlan bikum yā man lahum ‘aqlī ṣabā
kam dhā urá qāri‘ ataytuh khāḍi‘

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raṣd al-dhayl. qaṣīdah. muqtaḍab lābin sahil

column3: bi-al-lah yā layl ṭul wazid wazid
bi-al-lah yā ṣubḥ tub walā ta‘ud

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. raṣd al-dhayl. tawshīḥ mjzū’ al-raml

column2: yā al-wāla‘ bi-al-ḥubb āidhā ṣghīt līyā
column3: ghīr ṣbbar qalbk dābā īfarraj al-lah

column2: mā bqá fī qalbī idhā skhāūā bīyā
lāsh yā maḥbūbī tajfī blā nwīyā
column3: fiī al-mnām yāms rītak wal-jmīl lillah
